overview: Kimber and her dad, Steve, have just moved to the neighborhood and they're already the talk of the town. Well, at least Steve is. Apparently he's earned a reputation of being quite the Casanova and every woman wants a piece of him. But when Carmen, a young woman in the neighborhood, hears about Steve's sexual prowess she wants a piece too - despite the fact that he is twice her age
title: My Dad, Your Dad
